SEARCH
Package net.minestom.server.network.packet

Class PacketReading

java.lang.Object
net.minestom.server.network.packet.PacketReading
@Internal public final class PacketReading extends Object
Tools to read packets from a NetworkBuffer for network processing.

Fairly internal and performance sensitive.
